Title: Enacts the HOPE pilot program; appropriation
Summary: Enacts the HOPE pilot program; allows households to apply for multiple food and anti-poverty benefits simultaneously online and enable families to work with nonprofit and government agencies to enact action plans to boost their long-term self-sufficiency.
LawCode: Add ยง98, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to enacting the HOPE pilot program; and making an appropriation therefor
